solution_line_template: The customers that bought one watermelon bought {melons_per_customer_one_melon_group} * {customers_one_melon_group} = <<{melons_per_customer_one_melon_group}*{customers_one_melon_group}={total_melons_one_melon_group}>>{total_melons_one_melon_group} melons.

The customers that bought three melons bought {melons_per_customer_three_melon_group} * {customers_three_melon_group} = <<{melons_per_customer_three_melon_group}*{customers_three_melon_group}={total_melons_three_melon_group}>>{total_melons_three_melon_group} melons.

The stand sold {total_melons_sold} - {total_melons_one_melon_group} - {total_melons_three_melon_group} = <<{total_melons_sold}-{total_melons_one_melon_group}-{total_melons_three_melon_group}={melons_bought_by_two_melon_customers}>>{melons_bought_by_two_melon_customers} melons to customers who bought 2 melons.
